before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"bcvv4","text":"Prepare BSA Standards Plate (1st 4 rows from A to D):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1tog","text":"Add 40 uL of H2O into wells A1 to D1.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7l0n","text":"Add 40 uL of BSA Standards 1 (125 ug/mL) to 7 (2000 ug/mL) into columns 2 to 8.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a70li","text":"For this protocol you will need:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ej0ai","text":"Beckman-Coulter Biomek FX liquid handler system with a 96-pod head. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tn85","text":"Upload the attached method file and modify it to fit your deck and system configuration.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2h2js","text":"        ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aquni","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"file","mutability":"","data":{"forceSelection":true,"guid":"B0D4062017FE11EC85D0A74AD6E2AF7C","id":135311,"nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Modular Protein Quantitation method.bmf","placeholder":"","raw_source":"","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/eeerbdbyp.bmf"}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"25m87","text":"This protocol details steps to perform the protein quantification (Lowry-based) assay by using a Biomek FX liquid handler system. It is optimized to assay a full 96-well plate of protein samples in duplicate with a separate (control) plate for BSA standards. You will need a plate reader to measure the samples and standards. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bd5d9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1pbam","text":"This protocol works best as part of a full proteomic sample preparation workflow with:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3g3c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2bs0l","text":"Automated Chloroform-Methanol Protein Extraction on the Biomek-FX Liquid Handler System","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":87}],"data":{}},{"key":"5rvu3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59if4","text":"and ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54as8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"auvop","text":"Automated Protein Normalization and Tryptic Digestion on a Biomek-FX Liquid Handler System","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":90}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"DE884F60BD8411EB89547BE2033533B9","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/automated-chloroform-methanol-protein-extraction-o-bpfqmjmw"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"E822CE60BD8411EB89547BE2033533B9","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/automated-protein-normalization-and-tryptic-digest-buypnxvn"}}}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"7mmad","text":"- A Beckman-Coulter Biomek FX liquid handler system with a 96-pod head is used for this protocol. Alternative liquid handlers can be used with appropriate method development.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7k05s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7asc2","text":"- A Molecular Devices Spectramax 250 microplate reader is used for the protein quantification assay measurement.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6iag","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a5270","text":"- Because different deck orientations and system components are possible, you will need to modify the method file (attached in the 'Before start' section) for your specific Biomek liquid handler system.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"640j2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"20ae3","text":"Notes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dung8","text":"- This protocol is set up to measure the amount of protein in duplicate. warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"39b6n","text":"Wear proper PPE (gloves, safety goggles, and lab coat), and prepare solvents in a chemical fume hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"625ds","text":"Store organic solvents in a flammable storage cabinet when not in use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2p8uf","text":"Discard used solvents and buffers in appropriate waste containers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
